name: reference-manager
description: A local reference management tool using CSL-JSON as the single source of truth. Search, add, cite references, and manage full-text attachments.

tools.name: add
tools.description: Add references from PMID, DOI, BibTeX, RIS, or CSL-JSON

tools.name: fulltext_attach
tools.description: Attach full-text file to a reference

tools.name: fulltext_get
tools.description: Get full-text content for a reference

tools.name: fulltext_detach
tools.description: Detach full-text file from a reference

config_path.title: Config File Path
config_path.description: Path to the reference-manager configuration file (.toml). Leave empty to use default location (~/.reference-manager/config.toml).
